item.title: Going Forward
item.description: There’s quite a lot to unpack here. This site is currently using Quartz v3.3. It’s possible I may move to using Flowershow (official website) as time goes on.

item.title: Search
item.description: From https://quartz.jzhao.xyz/notes/search. Quartz supports two modes of searching through content. Full-text Full-text search is the default in Quartz. It produces results that exactly match the search query.

item.title: Why Use Quartz?
item.description: I wanted to use Quartz because I wanted a simple and elegant website where I can make my own website garden.
